newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stock index futures finish strong day higher - AUG 22.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stock index futures finish strong day higher - AUG 22.

text.p: Aug 22 - U.S. stock index futures ended higher after seeing brisk trade midday and a rally near seven-week highs in Sept S&P 500s. S&P 500 futures action slowed down heading into the close but trading was moderate overall, players said.
Resistance in September now rests at 674.00 and 675.00.
